content: The **Love Amplified Concert** was a concert held in Singapore at [Fort Canning Park](/wiki/Fort_Canning_Park) on 29 November 2008 to commemorate [World AIDS Day](/wiki/World_AIDS_Day) 2008. It was titled LOVE Amplified (Love Amp in short), and was organised by the [Health Promotion Board](/wiki/Health_Promotion_Board) bringing together Singapore talents including the likes of [Stefanie Sun](/wiki/Stefanie_Sun), [Hady Mirza](/wiki/Hady_Mirza), [Hossan Leong](/wiki/Hossan_Leong) and [Dim Sum Dollies](/wiki/Dim_Sum_Dollies). - Love Amplified, World AIDS Day 2008 Concert in Singapore This Singapore-related article is a stub. title: Love Amplified
